FI_OBS.long_name: observational fast ice per grid cell

FIP_OBS.description: fast ice as observed by Alex Fraser's 2020 fast ice dataset and re-gridded to CICE simulation grid

FIA.description: sea ice area summed over spatial extent and masked with fast ice criteria

FIE.description: sea ice extent summed over spatial extent and masked with fast ice criteria

FIV.description: sea ice volume summed over spatial extent and masked with fast ice criteria

FI_STRONG.description: sea ice strength times grid cell area summed over spatial extent and masked with fast ice criteria

FI_DIV.description: sea ice divergence times grid cell area summed over spatial extent and masked with fast ice criteria

FI_AGING.description: sea ice area divided by ice age summed over spatial extent and masked with fast ice criteria

FI_AGROT.description: sea ice area tendency thermodynamics times grid cell area summed over spatial extent and masked with fast ice criteria

FIC.description: sea ice concentration per grid cell masked with fast ice criteria and coarsened to temporal averaging window
